Reviews.Title: get one at walmart!!
Reviews.Author: yourklaus "THANKS"
Reviews.Content: this is the worst camera just buy a disposable one at walmart takes crap pictures and you must hold so still. not worth it Sell was cool after requesting they pay shipping do to malfunctioning and none acceptable quality they agreed

Reviews.Title: Durable, but slow between pics
Reviews.Author: MomOThree
Reviews.Content: Durable, waterproof seems to work, but there is a long lag between pics (even on lower pixel shots).  The zoom button isn't very smooth, but for the sale price its just fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Shoots pictures with 16 megapixel resolution and HD video, Waterproof up to 10 feet,2.5" LCD screen and 4x digital zoom, Automatic smile shutter and face detection, SDHC card compatible up to 16GB, 2 AAA batteries included.
Shoots pictures with 16 megapixel resolution and HD video
Waterproof up to 10 feet
2.5" LCD screen and 4x digital zoom
Automatic smile shutter and face detection
SDHC card compatible up to 16GB, 2 AAA batteries included.
ProductInfo.Name: Bell+Howell Splash II WP16-BL 16MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 2.5-Inch LCD Screen (Blue)
